International Bank (Liberia), Limited (IBLL) bụ ụlọ akụ na-arụ ọrụ zuru oke na Liberia.  Emebere ụlọ akụ ahụ mgbe International Trust Company nke Liberia mepụtara ngalaba ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa na 1960
Na 2000 International Trust Company ghọrọ International Bank
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Monrovia nwere ọtụtụ ebe na mba ahụ niile

International Bank na-agbatị ọrụ ụlọ akụ dị iche iche, gụnyere mana ọnweghị oke na: ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa na nkeonwe, mgbazinye ego azụmahịa na nke onwe, ọrụ mbufe ego, gụnyere wires, MoneyGram, Western Union, RIA, & Nobel, yana ọrụ ịkwụ ụgwọ & ọrụ nkuzi..
Ebe ndị a gụnyere Harbel, Harper, Pleebo, Kakata, Caldwell, Paynesville, Sinkor, Camp Johnson Road, Vai Town, Broad Street, na ụlọ ọrụ Monrovia Post.
